task.title: Adding Implementations
task.shortdesc: This section describes how to add implementations.

context.p: To add a new implementation to an existing project:, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Right-click the project name in the File List project view.
In the New Implementation dialog box, set the implementation name, directory, and default strategy.
To browse for the source files or use a source from an existing implementation, click on Add Source.
